content: >http://www.bloomberg.com/apps/news?pid=20601109&sid=aWVvOZT3UuyI&refer=news The increasingly parlous state of GM is putting the pension income of thousands of retirees in jeopardy. Worse than finding your nest egg reduced due to a declining market, is finding that your 'boss' invested your pension in his own pocket. And when those pockets are reduced to state of lint? Well, there go the pensions,too. Ain't rocket science, the bird in the hand is worth two in the Bush.

title: GM Pensions Headed South

content: Ya wonder: How many plans can the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation take over, before they go broke themselves?
reply: Ya wonder: How many plans can the Pension Benefit Guaranty Corporation take over, before they go broke themselves?
